field.name: event_ticket_id
field.query: SELECT event_ticket.id, CONCAT( event.name, ' - ' , ticket_type.name ) as event_ticket_name FROM #__swa_event_ticket AS event_ticket INNER JOIN #__swa_event AS event ON event_ticket.event_id=event.id INNER JOIN #__swa_ticket_type AS ticket_type ON event_ticket.ticket_type_id=ticket_type.id
field.label: Event ticket
